contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Minaprine is an amino phenylpyridazine antidepressant reported to be relatively free of cardiotoxicity drowsiness and weight gain Similar to other antidepressant treatments minaprine attenuates the beta adrenergic receptor function Studies have also shown that minaprine improves memory consolidation and that repeated drug administration leads to potentiation of this effect Moreover the effects of minaprine on memory consolidation are related to its dopaminergic action
